meanings.sent1: The spaeing fortune teller amazed everyone with her accurate predictions.
meanings.sent2: She had a spaeing ability to foresee what would happen next.

meanings.sent4: His spaeing dreams often revealed upcoming events in his life.

meanings.definition: The act of prophesying or divining.
meanings.sent1: Her spaeing of the future was renowned throughout the land.
meanings.sent2: The ancient art of spaeing was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The spaeing at the carnival was both entertaining and mysterious.
meanings.sent4: In the world of magic, spaeing was a respected skill.
meanings.sent5: The spaeing of the oracle was sought by many seeking guidance.

meanings.definition: To predict or foretell future events.
meanings.sent1: She would often spaeing what the weather would be like the next day.
meanings.sent2: The wise elder spaeing the coming of a great leader.
meanings.sent3: The children loved to spaeing what surprises awaited them on their birthdays.
meanings.sent4: He spaeing the outcome of the game with uncanny accuracy.
